name: CancelInvoice
description:
Cancel an invoice to prevent further transactions.

This tool cancels an invoice, ensuring that no payments can be collected. It cannot be used for invoices in the `DRAFT`, `PAID`, `REFUNDED`, `CANCELED`, or `FAILED` states.

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: The ID of the invoice you want to cancel. This is required to specify which invoice will be affected.

value_schema.description: The ID of the [invoice](entity:Invoice) to cancel.

parameters.name: invoice_version_to_cancel
parameters.description: The version number of the invoice to be canceled. Use GetInvoice or ListInvoices to find it if unknown.

value_schema.description:
The version of the [invoice](entity:Invoice) to cancel.
If you do not know the version, you can call 
[GetInvoice](api-endpoint:Invoices-GetInvoice) or [ListInvoices](api-endpoint:Invoices-ListInvoices).
